mapper.select: select P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE, count(C.PCID) as RCNT from POST_INFO P left join POST_COMMENT C on P.PID = C.PID group by P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE order by P.PID desc
mapper.insert: insert into POST_INFO (TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, HRS_HD) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, systimestamp, systimestamp, #{hrs_hd})
